game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on a thrilling adventure to locate the lost treasure of the ancient kingdom. Solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and navigate through treacherous paths to claim your reward.

task.description: Search the secret library in the abandoned castle to find the ancient map leading to the treasure.
Journey through the treacherous swamp to retrieve the enchanted key hidden in the heart of the forbidden forest.
Use the key to unlock the ancient gate guarding the entrance to the underground cavern where the treasure awaits.
